name: Shift-Faced
description:
Once upon a time... in a land far far away, there lived a mustachioed man who would shapeshift into various awesome battle animals in hopes of making it to work less late to appease the robot overlords. Maneuver your way around traffic or battle to death! Good luck, Have Fun!

Thanks for playing!

Controls:
Space Bar / Enter = Select / Continue
Arrow Keys = Movement

By: Taylor Dunn, Stephen Roper & Josh Watson.
Follow us on Twitter @ZamboniMacaroni

Tech:
Game Maker
Adobe Illustrator
Ableton Live 9
Spriter Pro
Sfxr
GitHub
Windows & Mac OS X
Google Fiber (KCMO)
